text: So I stress ate a candy bar. Not like a candy bar I'd normally eat(nice chocolate). Nope I bought a reese's outrageous bar. Why? I don't know. Do I recommend this - no it was ridiculous and gross. Will I do it again - maybe. Maybe.

text: Reese's are legit one of my weak spots

text:
Reese's are fine I ate one of these: <https://www.hersheys.com/reeses/en_us/outrageous.html>. that was the mistake
And yes we should open up #poetry
